channel.title: Rupertland Government News
channel.description: Latest news and announcements from the Principality of Rupertland

item.title: New Digital ID Portal Launched
item.description: The government announces the launch of a new secure Digital ID portal to streamline citizen services and improve accessibility to government programs.

item.title: Updated Business Registration Process
item.description: Significant improvements to the business registration system reduce processing times by 40% and eliminate paperwork through digital submission.

item.title: Summer Festival Schedule Released
item.description: The annual Rupertland Summer Cultural Festival returns with expanded programming, featuring local artists, traditional crafts, and international cuisine.

item.title: Enhanced Immigration Services Available
item.description: New online appointment system and extended office hours improve access to immigration and citizenship services for residents and visitors.

item.title: Property Registry Goes Digital
item.description: The Property Registry Office completes full digitization, enabling 24/7 online searches and faster processing of property transactions.
